title: Range to Byte Conversion
description:
RANGE_TO_BYTE converts a real value in a BYTE value. An input value of X
corresponds to the value of LOW is converted it into an output value of 0
and an input value X of the input value corresponds to HIGH is converted
into an output value of 255. The input X is limited to the range from LOW
to HIGH, an overfow of the output BYTE can therefore not happen.
name: RANGE_TO_BYTE

input.name: X
input.description: The real number input that is to be converted to a byte.

input.name: low
input.description: The lower bound of the range.

input.name: high
input.description: The upper bound of the range.

return_value.description: The resulting byte value after the conversion from the real number based on the defined range.
